message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $9,500 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
